effect.Name: Burn (Switch)
effect.description: The shader gives a burning effect.
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Burn (Switch) Shader | 1.0 (20.09.2025) */
parameter.description: The shader gives a burning effect.

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable manages which color will be reduced. Set to 0 is the blend color will be reduced and set to 1 is the base color will be reduced.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.

parameter.name: Offset
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the noise offset scale.

parameter.name: Ice Texutre
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the texture that is supposed to give the freezing effect.

parameter.name: Mask Texutre
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for mask effect for _Mixing.

parameter.name: ( Compatibility )
parameter.description: Here you will find options that have changed, but you can still achieve the previous effect.

parameter.name: Is Fusion Version Older Than 296?
parameter.description: (Only applies to Android and iOS!) This variable determines whether to use the newer background formatting. In Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for build 295.10 and earlier, the background texture was flipped along the Y axis, but this was changed in build 296.1. Check this option if you are using an older build!
